name: Planechase
tagline: A graphical implementation of planechase for android
body:
## Purpose
This project was meant to be an animated form of the Magic: The Gathering format known as planechase. After getting fragments working, I decided to end this project. Anyone is welcome to use this as a base to build out a working plaechase application.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
